about_the_game:
Game of Stealth:
In Assassin The First List, you'll step into the shoes of a highly skilled assassin, where your objective is to take down your target using your cunning and stealth. Find your target, study their behavior and movements, conduct extensive research, and execute a seamless assassination to become the top assassin in the game.
This is a game that will put your stealth and assassination skills to the ultimate test. As you progress through the levels, you'll need to carefully scout out your targets, plan meticulously, and then execute a clean and efficient assassination. Remember to audit your work and eliminate your competition to rise to the top of the leaderboard.
The game where you'll need to channel your inner assassin and take out your targets with precision and finesse. To succeed in this game, you'll need to meticulously research your target's movements, carefully plan your attack, and then strike swiftly to eliminate them. Make sure to audit your work to perfect your technique and dominate your competition.

Nightmare of Criminals:
In our game, you will be the ultimate nightmare for criminals - the Assassin, whose expertise lies in carrying out covert espionage and lethal missions. Armed with cutting-edge gadgets, you will possess the ability to perceive, discern and integrate into your surroundings with utmost precision, stealth, and proficiency, as you execute your objectives with ruthless efficiency. Whether it's a well-planned hit or a quick takedown, you will relish the thrill of becoming the most feared assassin on the block. Get ready to experience an unparalleled level of action, strategy, and adrenaline rush as you embark on this mission of a lifetime!

Deep in enemy territory:
As an elite spy assassin, you are deployed deep in enemy territory with a mission to eliminate a high-value target. You must rely on your extensive training and razor-sharp instincts to navigate the dangerous landscape undetected. But don't worry, you won't be alone in this mission. Your partner, a seasoned agent, will provide crucial support and guidance from a remote location. With the aid of cutting-edge technological insights and gadgets, you'll be able to eliminate guards and overcome obstacles, and evade deadly traps set by terrorists. Your stealth skills will be put to the ultimate test as you sneak past patrols and infiltrate high-security zones to complete your objective. The stakes are high, and failure is not an option - can you complete the mission and emerge victorious?

Old Secret Organizations:
Assassin is the ultimate game that combines elements of stealth, adventure, and espionage, making it perfect for players who crave a thrilling and immersive experience. In this game, you will become part of an ancient and secretive organization tasked with maintaining the delicate balance of power in the world and upholding justice. By completing a variety of challenging tasks and missions, you will rise through the ranks of the organization and unlock access to even more specialized and high-stakes assignments. Whether you prefer to rely on your wit, your strength, or your cunning, Assassin offers an unparalleled opportunity to showcase your skills and become a true master of the art of assassination.


Face The Consequences:
Assassin The First List is not just a game, it's an immersive experience that tests your nerves, skills, and cunning to the limit. Every mission is a delicate dance between staying hidden in the shadows and striking at the right moment. The game mechanics are designed to make you feel the weight of your decisions, the tension of every move, and the thrill of a successful hit. You'll have to scout your targets, study their habits and routines, and plan your approach carefully. A single mistake, a careless slip of the tongue, or a slight deviation from the plan can result in failure and certain death.

But this game is not just about the thrill of the kill. It's about the journey to victory, your hard choices, and the blood-soaked path you leave behind. You'll have to confront the moral implications of your actions, decide who deserves to live or die and face the consequences of your choices. The game offers no mercy, no forgiveness, and no second chances. It's up to you to become the best version of yourself, eliminate your competition, and rise to the top of the assassin's guild. The road to victory is paved with blood and sacrifice, but the reward is worth it. Are you ready to take on the challenge?

Assassin's World:
As you delve deeper into Assassin's World, you'll become increasingly entwined in the intricate web of global politics and intrigue. The organizations you belong to are steeped in tradition, history, and secrets, and it's your responsibility to safeguard these secrets at all costs. As you progress through the game, you'll face many challenges, including infiltrating heavily fortified facilities, executing high-profile targets, and navigating complex political landscapes.
With its stunning graphics, immersive gameplay, and vast array of customizable options, Assassin is the ultimate gaming experience for those seeking the thrill of adventure, the rush of adrenaline, and the satisfaction of a job well done. Are you ready to join the ranks of the elite assassins and take your place in history?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or inappropriate for viewing at work. This game contains Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content, Drug Use, and illegal substance use. There are no sexual acts, but there are some sexual themes where people appear half-naked. Please be cautious as this game also includes acts of suicide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or AMD equivalent with at least 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 or AMD RX6600 with 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

short_description: Assassin is a stealth action game in which information is power. Become the master assassin, taking on the role of a highly-trained agent who's been sent to eliminate a group of targets from around the world. They will never know what hit them.
